page.title: 17CHILDRENS PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {TICKI SCARECROW}.This is a running game and needs at least three people playing it.The captain crow(the person who is on)counts to fifty,while all the other crows(children)run away.The captain crow has to try to tick the other crows.Once you have been ticked you must stand still with your arms out like a scarecrow and cannot move until one of the crows(not the captain) goes under both his arms.This goes on until one person has been a scarecrow,three times(he is then the captain)or every one is a scarecrow together and there is nobody to free the scarecrow. {FARMER FARMER.}In this game you have to have a farmer.The rest of you are children.Then the children ask the farmer,"farmer,farmer,can we cross your golden bridge,on the way to school today".Then the farmer says
